The claim states that U: S. Rep. Bruce Poliquin voted to "force seniors to pay more for prescription drugs."
The ad by the political action committee: force seniors to pay thousands more."
Poliquin: s office denies the claim and states that he has been working to lower prescription drug prices and strongly supports Medicare coverage for prescription drugs for seniors.
The claim is based on Poliquin: s March 25, 2015, vote for a Republican budget that called for the repeal of the Affordable Care Act, which would eliminate a fix to Medicare Part D known as the prescription drug doughnut hole.
